page.title: 12POPULATION 2
page.content: IN MOOR MONKTON MOST OF THE VILLAGE FARMS ARE OCCUPIED BY PART TIME FARMERS OR ARE PURELY RESIDENTIAL THE POPULATION IS LITTLE CHANGED SINCE 1891 CENSUS RECORDED 50 HOUSES WITH A POPUATION OF 232. THE MAJORITY ARE C.OF E. BUT THERE ARE SOME WESLEYANS. THE MAJORITY ARE CONSERVATIVE SEMI-URBANIZED, LIVING IN THE COUNTRY AND WORKING IN TOWN. HOWEVER THE ESTATE VILLAGE ATMOSPHERE PERSISTS. AT BENINGBROUGH HALL THERE ARE 15 PERMANENTLY RESIDENT ADULTS AND 5 CHILDREN LIVING ON THE ESTATE. THE ADMINISTRATORS AND CUSTODIANS EMPLOYED BY THE NATIONAL TRUST LIVE IN THE HALL.IN THE GRO0OMS COTTAGE THE HEAD GARDENER AND HIS FAMILY LIVE. OTHER FARM WORKERS LIVE IN THE FARM COTTAGES. GUIDES ,CLEANERS AND AN ASSISTANT GARDENER COME DAILY TO THE HALL TO WORK FROM ELSEWHERE.
